title: Quarter finals shaping up and that France vs England game will perhaps be the toughest matchup of the world cup so far.

author: Pretend-Warning-772
text:
Everyone here is saying France will roll over England meanwhile I'm sweating my ass off.
Allez les Bleus !

author: mudman13
text: They have goals but if you stop the supply from their mediocre midfield then you should be ok

author: Zigzagnemesis
text: France will smoke England, England notoriously go missing against any semi-decent team. Come back on Saturday and you’ll see. Gareth “disappointing” Southgate will be back. England have a great talented squad but mentality is always more important than talent. France 3-1 England.

author: Retirix_YT
text: Stop repeating the same message on every thread lmao

author: Zigzagnemesis
text: It’s because everyone knows that England cannot play in high pressure big matches. If this was a group stage match then I think England would win.

author: Faprika
text: Semi-final at 2018 WC and Final at Euro 2020, you are clueless

author: Zigzagnemesis
text: Which of those did England win again?
